pkgmetadata.longdescription: Zhang + Yue-Pilon Trends Package // An efficient implementation of the slope method described by Sen (1968) doi:10.1080/01621459.1968.10480934 plus implementation of prewhitening approaches to determining trends in climate data described by Zhang, Vincent, Hogg, and Niitsoo (2000) doi:10.1080/07055900.2000.9649654 and Yue, Pilon, Phinney, and Cavadias (2002) doi:10.1002/hyp.1095.
